oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "The Poetess" and Nineteenth-Century American Women Poets
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jackson, Virginia
Richards, Eliza C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 19th-century literature
women poets
American literature
transatlantic literature
poetry
Poetess
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This essay delineates nineteenth-century women writers' relationship to the transatlantic figure of the poetess, on the way triangulating connections as well as disarticulations among high and popular, British and American literatures.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: paj:The Journal of the Initiative for Digital Humanities, Media, and Culture; Vol. 1 No. 1 (2007): Inaugurating The Poetess Archive
